Edges-Patchwork -- Male Human Legendary Patchwork Monster
Attributes (13 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d12+1 Vigor: d12+2
Attribute Notes:
Parts: +2 Strength Step/+2 Vigor Step
Death's Haze: Smarts may only be advanced once
Skills (24 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d6 Psionics: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4-1 Notice: (sma) d6-1 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d8 Occult: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d8
Fighting: (agi) d6 Performance: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Gambling: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d4
Skill Notes:
Clueless+: -1 Common Knowledge/-1 Notice
Flashbacks: May increase any skill one step (linked attribute maximum) 1/encounter
Parts: Successful Healing-4 or Weird Science reattaches severed body part
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 16; Edge: 8; Skill: 12
Features
Edges (6 points): Detachable Parts; Discharge; Flashbacks; Hardy; Patchwork Monster; Roar Hindrances: Hesitant; Poverty; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Death's Haze: Has Clueless+ feature
Fire Bad!: Has Phobia+ feature
Patchwork Monster: Has Ageless, Berserk, Death's Haze, Fire Bad!, Parts, Rage, Science!, Undead, and Weakness (Fire) features
Science!: Has Arcane Resistance feature
Ageless: Does not age
Detachable Parts: May detach and remotely control (up to 1 mile) body parts/May regrow destroyed body parts
Phobia+: Suffers -2 on Trait rolls in the presence of phobia subject
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Combat
Parry: 8 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 12 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Chainsaw (2d6+4); Holy Water Spray (None R1"); SAW (2d8 R30" AP 2); Unarmed (d12+1+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Undead: +2 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Arcane Resistance: Foes suffer -2 arcane skill and arcane damage when targeting self
Berserk: Injury causes +1 Strength Step, wild attacks, +2 Toughness, ignore 1 Wound penalty, and random hits on critical failure for up to 10 rd (Smarts-2 neg)
Discharge: May suffer Fatigue to inflict 4d6 electrical damage in a 3" radius
Hardy: Does not suffer a Wound from a second Shaken result
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers a major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
Roar: May make an Intimidation Test against all targets in a 9" cone
Undead-1: +2 Shaken recovery/Takes no additional damage from a Called Shot/Ignores 1 point of Wound penalties/Doesn't breathe/Immune to disease and poison
Weakness (Fire): Suffers +4 damage from fire
